de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.client

Interface IClientContex


  • public interface IClientContex
    English:
    Tha methods are used in the tag match panel and called if the current document is cut, stored or split.
    was:
    API.getClientAPI().getClientContex().java

    • Method Detail

      • abortTagMatch

        void abortTagMatch(HashMap hm,
                 boolean oper)
        Is called when a tagmatch is aborted
        Parameters:
        hm - map which contains documentcontainer and aborted tagmatch
        oper - true, if the question is opened in operator mode, otherwise false

      • saveTagMatch

        void saveTagMatch(HashMap hm,
                boolean oper)
        Is called when a tagmatch is saved
        Parameters:
        hm - map that contains documentcontainer and saved tagmatch
        oper - true, if the question is opened in operator mode, otherwise false

      • preSplitDocuments

        boolean preSplitDocuments(Question question,
                        HashMap hm,
                        boolean oper)
        Is called before a document is split.
        Parameters:
        question - the current question
        hm - currently null
        oper - true, if the question is opened in operator mode, otherwise false
        Returns:
        true if the document may be split, false if the document may not be split

        newQuestion - new question after document are splited

        oper - true, if the question is opened in operator mode, otherwise false
